name: Linux Mute on Unfocus
description: mutes the game when you alt tab on the penguin operating system (and prolly windows too)

single-threaded.name: Poll on Game Thread
single-threaded.description: Polls for unfocus on the game thread rather than a seperate thread. may *slightly* improve performance on low core count cpus.

poll-interval.name: Polling Interval (milliseconds)
poll-interval.description: The amount of time in milliseconds between focus checks.
